snippet.title: Usurper | Gameplay Trailer 2
snippet.description:
(Links below) Usurper is a Metroidvania Action-RPG. With Eldritch horrors having been unleashed by the outer-worldly Citadel, your job is to rid London of its terrors. Use the new "Guard" system that rewards skillful play and accuracy, to uncover the massive structure and defeat the nightmares lurking within.

Usurper Steam Store Page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/603020/Usurper/

Our Twitter: https://twitter.com/pugware

Usurper is currently in Steam Early Access, although the game is story-complete. See the Steam store page for more details!
